Sentencas: In this study, three different mixtures including natural volcanic rock basalt, waste window glass, and Na2CO3 were developed as sealants for using solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: The mixtures were melted at 1500 degrees C and cast into the water and graphite mold.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: The bulk glass parts were used in dilatometer analysis to determine the coefficient of thermal expansion.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: Glass cast into the water were milled and sized - 53 mu m and, after certain pretreatments, coated on Crofer, AISI 409 and 439 stainless steel by dip-coating method.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: After the coating, heat treatment was performed at 850, 900, and 950 degrees C in order to ensure permanent bonding and sealing between glass-ceramic sealing and steel substrate.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: As a result of the heat treatment, the transformation from a glassy structure to a glass-ceramic structure occurred.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: The interface between glass-ceramic sealing and steel substrate, bonding, and sealing properties were examined by scanning electron microscopy and X-ray diffraction analysis to determine its suitability for SOFC.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: Furthermore, the activation energies for the precipitation of crystalline phases have been evaluated, and the crystallization mechanisms have been studied by DTA results.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: The crystallization kinetics was described in terms of the nucleation growth Johnson-Mehl-Avrami model.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC

Sentencas: The results showed that surface crystallization became more effective instead of volume crystallization with increasing Na content.
Titulo: Glass-ceramic sealant with different alkali contents made from natural and waste materials for SOFC
